Title: Relates to providing transparency to residential utility and municipality ratepayers on the cost impact of the climate action council's scoping plan
Summary: Requires utility corporations and municipalities to ensure that bills for service to residential customers include a line item for cost impact measures taken in accordance with the climate action council's final scoping plan; requires the department of public service to establish a formula to enable utility corporations and municipalities to calculate the cost impact on each residential customer's bill attributed to measures taken in accordance with the climate action council's final scoping plan.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing transparency to residential utility and municipality ratepayers on the cost impact of the climate action council's scoping plan
